name: GPT-4.1
description: GPT-4.1 is OpenAI's enhanced model with major improvements in coding and instruction following. It outperforms GPT-4o across benchmarks, achieving 21.4 percentage point gains on SWE-bench Verified.
notes: Best choice for coding-intensive applications with 1 million token context window and 32,000 token output. No extra cost for extended context. Supports 75% discount for cached inputs.
